game.name: Crown Code Chronicles
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Crown Code Chronicles is a story-driven, JRPG-style game with a unique turn-based combat system. Inspired by titles like Chrono Trigger, Chrono Cross, FFX, & Child Of Light. Experience this emotional roller coaster as Vareus; a prince who uses an ancient relic to time travel to save his loved ones!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Crown Code Chronicles is a story-driven, JRPG-style game with a unique turn-based combat system. Inspired by titles like Chrono Trigger, Chrono Cross, FFX, & Child Of Light. Experience this emotional roller coaster as Vareus; a prince who uses an ancient relic to time travel to save his loved ones!
